Etsy | Senior Software Engineer | REMOTE anywhere in USA

https://www.etsy.com/careers/job/c13723d8-a107-481d-be4b-91f...

I'm the manager for this position, and I'm looking for a team lead who is interested in improving Etsy for our international users.

Perks:

- collaborative team

- lots of growth potential

- work/life balance

- remote friendly (some remotes on the team, others in SF)!

Looking for:

- 3+ years of web development experience

- interest in a leadership position

- comfortable with wearing many hats

Apply at the link or email adit@etsy.com.
